result.title: Download That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: The Movie – Scarlet Bond (2022) (Japanese with Esubs) BluRay HEVC || 720p [500MB] || 1080p [1.3GB]
result.description:
“That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: The Movie – Scarlet Bond” is the latest addition to the “That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime” franchise. The movie is set after the events of the second season of the anime series. The story revolves around Rimuru Tempest, a former human who was reincarnated as a slime in a fantasy world.

In this movie, Rimuru travels to the Kingdom of Falmuth to establish diplomatic relations with them. However, things take a turn for the worse when Rimuru and his companions are caught up in a plot to overthrow the kingdom’s government. Rimuru must use his wits and skills to save his friends and stop the conspirators before it’s too late.

The movie opens with Rimuru and his companions arriving in the Kingdom of Falmuth to establish diplomatic relations with them. However, they are met with hostility from the kingdom’s officials, who see them as a threat. Things escalate quickly when Rimuru and his companions are accused of being spies and are imprisoned.

While in prison, Rimuru meets a mysterious woman named Shuna, who claims to be a spy for the kingdom’s opposition. She tells Rimuru about the kingdom’s corrupt government and how they plan to use their military might to conquer other countries.

Rimuru, with the help of his friends, escapes from prison and sets out to stop the kingdom’s plans. Along the way, they meet new allies and face off against powerful foes, including a powerful mage named Veldora.

In the final showdown, Rimuru and his companions face off against the kingdom’s army and its leaders. Rimuru uses his unique skills to turn the tide of the battle and save the kingdom from destruction.

The movie features a cast of familiar and new characters from the “That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime” franchise.

“That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: The Movie – Scarlet Bond” is now available for download on various streaming platforms. You can download the movie from Amazon Prime, Google Play, iTunes, and many more.
